body_html: BTW, haven't written tests for the other descriptors, just TensorDescriptor (which is the most common one). These tests are mostly to check if those classes compile/link/run correctly in cpp extensions. If we want to test those classes more thoroughly, that would belong in the cpp tests, not the cpp extension tests. I would rather open that can of worms as a separate issue so I can get to using TensorDescriptor.

body: BTW, haven't written tests for the other descriptors, just `TensorDescriptor` (which is the most common one). These tests are mostly to check if those classes compile/link/run correctly in cpp extensions. If we want to test those classes more thoroughly, that would belong in the cpp tests, not the cpp extension tests. I would rather open that can of worms as a separate issue so I can get to using TensorDescriptor.
